exam.question: Although the model looks good on the surface, it will not bear close ______.

answer.explain: 句意： 尽管这个模型外表看起来不错， 但经不起仔细观察。temperament： 气质； contamination： 玷污； symmetry： 对称。

sentences.sContent: Their activities have come under police scrutiny .
sentences.sCn: 他们的活动受到警方的严密监视。

sentences.sContent: ...It has been the subject of your close scrutiny every morning since you were tall enough to see into the bathroom mirror...

synos.tran: 详细审查；监视；细看；选票复查

remMethod.val: scru(音似： 四顾) ＋ tiny(微小的) → 连微小的都要顾到 → 详细检查

words.tran: 细看；仔细观察或检查；核对（等于scrutinize）

trans.tranCn: 详细检查， 仔细观察
trans.tranOther: careful and thorough examination of someone or something
